div.p: Effect of the EOCL on ketamine-induced sleep latency (Panel A) and total sleeping time (Panel B) in mice.
VEH, EOCL and DZM represent vehicle (control), essential oil of C. longa and diazepam respectively. N = 5.
*p < 0.05 compared to control; **p < 0.01compared to other groups (ANOVA, Dunnett’s test).
